segments.text: Look at this fair . This is my first chance to be involved in the fair . It is so gorgeous and amazing !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I felt dizzy when I stare at those shining lights . What should we do firstly ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now we should design our booth . Do you know the number for our booth , B ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see the notice . It is here . Our booth number is E108 . Good number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Lucky number . Find its location now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can also consult some from these volunteers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here it is . Well , remember to have our cards on to tell every visitor where we come from .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Should we put our samples on this table ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , they should be put in the most attractive place , and this can appeal to passers-by's attention .
segments.speaker: S1
